wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Oliver McCrea Roome CBE (9 March 1921 – 8 November 2009) was a British Army officer.He was the son of Maj. Gen. Sir Horace Roome.

response: *Horace Roome (1887–1964), British army officer, father of Oliver Roome
*Oliver Roome (1921–2009), British army officer, son of Horace Roome
His son was Major-General Oliver Roome, R.E.
